TextView.android:text: TRAIT NAME
CONFLICTING TRAITS
NAME always says exactly what's on their mind, especially if it's bugging PRONOUN. \nThat tends to rub people the wrong way.
Has a tendency to slight and insult people\n-15% of the market value
Annoying Voice
NAME's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. \nThis predisposes others to dislike them.
-25 opinion from other colonists\n-20% of the market value

NAME has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. \nNAME will become unhappy if if [sic] NAME has a bedroom that's too impressive. \nPRONOUN also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. NAME never judges others by their appearance.

+5 mood bonus for having an awful bedroom \n-5 mood penalty for having a slightly impressive or better bedroom. \nMood not affected by food quality, prefers raw food. Pawn beauty of others does not change pawn's social opinion on that pawn
Greedy \nJealous \nGourmand
NAME is romantically attracted to both men and women.
Will have romantic relationships with people from either gender.
Blood Lust
NAME gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death.

+3/+5/+7/+8 mood bonus for wearing clothing made out of human skin 
+8 mood bonus for witnessing a stranger's death 
+13 mood bonus for killing strangers 
No mood penalty for wearing tainted clothes 
Four times as likely to start a social fight
Body Purist
NAME believes the human body is limited for a reason. To them, bionic body parts are unethical.
Heavy mood penalty for having artificial body parts, starting at -10, going down to -35 \n-8 opinion of other colonists for each part installed on them, down to -40
NAME likes to fight up close and personal. \nPRONOUN's accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but PRONOUN'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
Trigger Happy \nCareful Shooter \nWimp
NAME was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. \nBut one time, long ago, PRONOUN tried it... and PRONOUN liked it.
+3/+5/+7/+8 mood bonus for wearing clothing made out of human skin \n+15 mood bonus after eating meal made with human flesh \n+20 mood bonus after eating raw human flesh
Creepy Breathing
NAME breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
-25 opinion from other colonists \n-10% of the market value
Fast Learner
NAME has a knack for learning. PRONOUN picks things up much faster than others.
Global learning speed +75%
Slow Learner
NAME is romantically attracted to people of their own gender
Will only have romantic relationships with people of the same gender.
NAME's life revolves around food. \nPRONOUN gets hungry quickly, and if PRONOUN is in a bad mood, \nPRONOUN will often satisfy PRONOUN-self by eating.
+50 % hunger rate \n+4 cooking skill \nOnly possible mental break is food binge; can randomly change to such
Great Memory
NAME has a fantastic memory for detail. PRONOUN will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
Skill loss rate x50%
NAME needs a really impressive bedroom. PRONOUN gets a mood loss if they don't get what they want.
-8/-8/-8/-6/-4 mood penalty for not having an impressive bedroom.
For NAME, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else.\nNAME gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
-8 mood penalty for not having the best bedroom.
NAME is a nice person. They have a tendency to brighten everyone else's day and never insult others.
Sometimes tells others Kind Words\n+5 mood bonus for anyone who has been told Kind Words by this colonist\nWill not Slight or Insult others
For NAME, there's something exciting about getting hurt. PRONOUN doesn't know why, PRONOUN's just wired differently.

+5 mood bonus for being in a little pain
+10 mood bonus for being in medium pain
+15 mood bonus for being in severe pain
+20 mood bonus for being in shock
NAME really dislikes and distrusts men.
-25 opinion of men.
NAME really dislikes and distrusts women.
-25 opinion of women.
Great Memory
NAME has a fantastic memory for detail. PRONOUN will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
Skill loss rate x50%
